## Column
    
### Data Table
    
```{r}

makeTable <- reactive({
    DT::datatable(
        { data.frame(x= 1:100, y = input$paging)},   # Some dummy data
        options= list(
            paging = input$paging
        )
    )
})
# Render the datatable returned by the reactive function
output$table <- DT::renderDataTable( makeTable() )

DT::dataTableOutput("table")


```
